rooms.description: Spacious entrance with reception area and waiting space.
Open concept living area with ample natural light from large windows and sliding glass doors to connect indoors and outdoors.
Formal dining space adjacent to the living room, designed for joint family gatherings.
Modern kitchen with natural ventilation and integrated storage solutions. Vastu oriented placement to enhance energy flow.
Dedicated area for household staff with private bathroom and small common area, ensuring privacy and convenience.
Space for appliances, storage and cleaning supplies. Vastu compliant location to maintain balance in energy.
